titleStmt.title: SII 6.337: original edition by K. V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 337. (A.R. No. 54 of 1898). ON THE WEST AND SOUTH WALLS OF THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumakaḷpolap porunilaccelviyun taṉak=ke Urimaiy pūṇ ṭamai maṉak=koḷa kāntaḷurcālai kalamaṟuttaruḷi veṅkaināṭum gaṅgapāṭiyum ṉuḷampapāṭiyum taṭikaivaḻiyum kuṭamalaināṭum kollamum kaliṅkamum Eṇṭicai pukaḻtara Īḻamaṇṭalamum tiṇṭiṟal veṟṟi taṇṭāṟ koṇṭa taṉṉeḻil vaḷaruḻi Ellā viyāṇṭum toḻutakai viḷaṅkum yāṇṭe ceḻiyarait tecukoḷ śrīkorājarāja rājakesarivarmmaṟku yāṇṭu 10 7 Āvatu kāliyūrkkoṭṭattu taṉakūṟṟu Uttarameruccaturvvedimaṅgalattu subrahmaṇyadevar tam poṉ kuṭuttukkoṇṭa Āṭu nāṟppattañciṉāl
Arai viḷakkum Ilāṭaippāṭiyil Aruḷayapāṭi Eṇṇāyirakkoṉ vaitta kāl viḷakkāl Āṭu Irupattumuṉṟum Ivvūr vaṭapiṭākai Appāṭṭipūṇṭi Irukkum maṉṟāṭi Ak=kumaraṉ kaṇṭaṉ vaitta kāl viḷakkāl Āṭu Irupattu muṉṟum puḻalkoṭṭattu niṉṟavūr yāḷuṅkaṇattāruḷ pāṭakattu Attoṇakramavittaṉ makaṉ tiruvaraṅkakramavittaṉ vaitta Araik=kāl viḷakkāl Āṭu patiṉoṉṟe kālum Akkāliyūrk=koṭṭattu taṉkūṟṟu Uttarameruccaturvvedimaṅkalattu śrīkovin=tacceri yāḷumkaṇattāruḷ neriṭṭur yaññayakramavittaccomāciyā rivvuttaramelūr subrahmaṇyadevark=ku vaitta Oru viḷak=kā
l Āṭu toṇṇūṟum 9 10m Ivvuttaramelūr śrīvāmaṉacceri yāḷumkaṇattār Attiyūr nakka māva
tu muṉṟāṅ kaṇṇāṟu kuḻi Āyiramum cilālekai paṇṇikkuṭuttom Āḷuṅkaṇattoma .
From Attiyūr the writing is decidedly later.
Digital edition of SII 6.337 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
